Detailed Description

Servers as the abstract base class for columns that can have child columns within them such as the ComboColumn and CheckboxColumn.

Used only by the Grid control, ColumnListColumn type classes can have their own list of columns specified within their inner body, which this class maintains.

All child classes of this class need a data source for rows of data that it uses. Data can be provided to the column by either using the DataSourceId property (which will cause an Ajax Get data request to happen to get the actual data) or the LocalData property which is a specially formated string containing all of the data for small datasets. /remarks>

string Nitobi.ColumnListColumn.GetDataUrl [get, set]

The URL of the data handler to make the Ajax get data request call to obtain the data needed by the control. You mus talso specify the DataSourceid for the Ajax call to function properly.

string Nitobi.ColumnListColumn.DataSourceId [get, set]

The id to pass when requesting the data using the Ajax get data request. You must also specify the GetDataUrl property for the Ajax call to function properly.

Implements Nitobi.IColumnCollection.

string Nitobi.ColumnListColumn.LocalData [get, set]

A specially formatted string in the JSON format that contains all of the data needed by the child columns.

This is very useful for small data sets to avoid excessing Ajax calls after the grid control is initialized during a page load. The following examples show of the format expected for this property: 

[{value:'True',display:''},{value:'False',display:''}]

[{firstName:'John', lastName:'Adams'},{firstName:'Matthew', lastName: 'Smith'}]

string Nitobi.ColumnListColumn.ValueField [get, set]

defines which field from the child row data to use for the value of the main row data being edited.
